parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the linked ABS brake system can cause the brakes to fail or malfunction, leading to loss of control, accidents, and potentially life-threatening situations.
symptoms: the rear wheel and front wheel do not work together
the rear pedal is difficult to modulate
and the vehicle may experience unexpected stops or loss of control.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the final drive can cause loss of oil and require complete replacement, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: complete failure of the final drive

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ABS sensor can cause the brakes to malfunction, leading to loss of control, accidents, and potentially life-threatening situations.
symptoms: and the brakes release without warning.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: A fuel line leak can cause a fire hazard, especially when the fuel comes into contact with a hot catalytic converter, which can lead to a serious accident or injury.
symptoms: fuel leaking from the quick release mechanism
fuel leaking from the fuel line adjacent to the right throttle body
fuel dripping onto the catalytic converter.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the transmission can cause the motorcycle to lose power and control, leading to accidents or fatalities, especially at high speeds.
symptoms: metal fragments coming out of the transmission

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the final drive can cause the motorcycle to lose power and control, leading to accidents or fatalities, especially at high speeds.
symptoms: Oil leak around the rubber boot on the final drive shaft
failure of the final drive bearing
failure of the final drive assembly
wheel hopping up and down severely.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the gearbox can cause the motorcycle to lose power and control, leading to accidents or fatalities, especially at high speeds.
symptoms: something letting go in the gearbox when shifting between gears
metal fragments coming out of the transmission.
